holidays.title: Batman Day
holidays.description: Billionaire Bruce Wayne by day, crime-fighting caped crusader Batman by night.

holidays.title: National Cleanup Day
holidays.description: After all, being a good citizen includes keeping our communities clean!

holidays.title: National Dance Day
holidays.description: We brought the music, you bring the moves!

holidays.title: Abergavenny Food Festival
holidays.description: Don’t even think about missing this food festival if you are in the U.K.

holidays.title: Anne Bradstreet Day
holidays.description: Let’s tap into our inner Anne Bradstreet and honor and celebrate her today!

holidays.title: Collect Rocks Day
holidays.description: We are getting our tools ready to start digging and collecting.

holidays.title: Feast Portland
holidays.description: Grab your forks and get your appetites ready because we are celebrating Feast Portland!

holidays.title: International Coastal Cleanup Day
holidays.description: Let’s roll up our sleeves and clean our beaches and coastlines to reduce pollution.

holidays.title: International Day for the Preservation of the Ozone Layer
holidays.description: Here’s how to look after and celebrate Earth’s blankie this Ozone Day!

holidays.title: International Eat An Apple Day
holidays.description: As the saying goes, that's how you keep the doctor away.

holidays.title: International Red Panda Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the day to encourage the preservation of the adorable red pandas.

holidays.title: Malaysia Day
holidays.description: Malaysia Day is the perfect time to educate yourself about Malaysia's history.

holidays.title: Maldives: Qaumee Dhuvas
holidays.description: Observe the day to commemorate the victory in remembrance of Muhammad Thakurufaanu al-Auzam.

holidays.title: Mayflower Day
holidays.description: Sail through time with us to reveal the Mayflower experience.

holidays.title: Mexican Independence Day
holidays.description: This fiesta-friendly holiday is filled with national pride, colorful parades, and Sabrosa food.

holidays.title: National AKC Responsible Dog Ownership Day
holidays.description: Hey, dog owners, kiss your buddies and give them extra special treats today!

holidays.title: National Boys’ and Girls’ Club Day for Kids
holidays.description: National Boys’ and Girls’ Club Day for Kids is here, let’s celebrate!

holidays.title: National Choose Your Chocolate Day
holidays.description: This perfect combination of cocoa, milk, and sugar has been celebrated for thousands of years.

holidays.title: National Cinnamon Raisin Bread Day
holidays.description: Savor the rich goodness of toasted cinnamon raisin bread with butter melting into every little crevice.

holidays.title: National Gymnastics Day
holidays.description: Gyms turn into beehives of activity, highlighting the benefits of a healthy body.

holidays.title: National Play-Doh Day
holidays.description: Join us as we mold (clay pun intended) this day into the best Play-Doh Day!

holidays.title: National Sew a Jelly Roll Day
holidays.description: Warm those Jelly Rolls up; it’s time for National Sew a Jelly Roll Day!

holidays.title: National Sit With a Stranger Day
holidays.description: Make new friends, sit with strangers, and build new relationships on this day.

holidays.title: National Stepfamily Day
holidays.description: Here’s to all the incredible blended families that are making it work!

holidays.title: National Tattoo Story Day
holidays.description: Prepare for the story that will inspire you to go get tatted!

holidays.title: National Trail of Tears Commemoration Day
holidays.description: The day remembers the thousands of Cherokees and Native Americans that died horrific deaths.

holidays.title: Papua New Guinea Independence Day
holidays.description: It’s Papua New Guinea Independence Day! Let us celebrate this nation’s bloodless path to independence.

holidays.title: Puppy Mill Awareness Day
holidays.description: Did you know millions of dogs are killed due to puppy mills every day?

holidays.title: Responsible Dog Ownership Day
holidays.description: Today, pet parents ‘pawse’ and remember the promises they made to their ‘furever’ friends.

holidays.title: Stay Away From Seattle Day
holidays.description: Here’s how to celebrate and, by celebrate, we mean to stay away from Seattle!

holidays.title: Teenager Workout Day
holidays.description: Let’s tackle a heavy issue that’s been weighing America’s kids down.

holidays.title: Usher Syndrome Awareness Day
holidays.description: The first step to raising awareness for this rare genetic disease is educating yourself.

holidays.title: Working Parents Day
holidays.description: Appreciate the efforts of the parents who juggle professional and personal responsibilities.

holidays.title: World Barber Day
holidays.description: Here's a tribute to people who wield scissors and combs like magic wands!

holidays.title: World Ozone Day
holidays.description: Join us as we get ready to go green for World Ozone Day!

holidays.title: Alexis Bledel’s Birthday
holidays.description: From acting as a hobby to honing the craft — this star has come a long way!

holidays.title: BB King’s Birthday
holidays.description: We can never forget the legendary B.B. King who’s deservedly called the “King of Blues.”

holidays.title: Chase Stokes’s Birthday
holidays.description: He only just got onto our screens but we already love his work!

holidays.title: Claire Saffitz’s Birthday
holidays.description: Learn more about Saffitz's background, cooking history, and adventures in the kitchen right here!

holidays.title: Ian Harding’s Birthday
holidays.description: What better way to celebrate his special day than to learn more about him?

holidays.title: Lauren Bacall’s Birthday
holidays.description: The actress whose provocative glamor elevated her to stardom in Hollywood's golden age.

holidays.title: Marc Anthony’s Birthday
holidays.description: With this singer, actor, and producer, what you see is what you get.

holidays.title: Nick Jonas’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this multi-talented singer, songwriter, and actor, the sky is the starting point.
